instruction: Create an argument for why people should consider a plant-based diet.
output: A plant-based diet is an ethical and sustainable way to nourish your body. It is low in saturated fat and rich in nutrients, meaning fewer risks for cardiovascular health problems. Additionally, it reduces the consumption of animal-based products which can otherwise contribute to animal cruelty and food insecurity. Even small changes in dietary habits can have a positive impact on the environment, so it's worth considering!
